dead-count.description: Specify the maximum number of times at which the DHCP server does not send response packets.

timeout.description: Specify the timeout period for waiting for response packets from a DHCP server.

dead-time.description: Specify the recovery time of a DHCP server.

nak-count.description: Specify the maximum number of NAK packets a DHCP server can receive consecutively.

dhcp-servers.description: List of DHCP servers. A DHCP server must be bound to at least one dhcp-server group at the same time.

dhcp-server.description: Configure a DHCP server and must bind it to at least one dhcp-server group at the same time.

ip-address.description: The IP address of the DHCP server.

vpn-instance.description: Define the vpn-instance of a DHCP server. If dhcp-server belongs to the public network, vpn-instance can be defined as '_public_'.

limit-number.description: Number of packets discarded due to rate limiting.

timeout-packets.description: Number of times that a DHCP server fails to respond to a DHCP request before the timer expires.

latest-send-time.description: Last time when a packet was sent.

lastest-receive-time.description: Last time when a packet was received.

name.description: Specify the name of the DHCPv4 server group.

remote-backup-service-name.description: Specify the backup service associated with the DHCPv4 server group.

bind-servers.description: List of IP addresses of a DHCPv4 server and the weight of a specified DHCPv4 server when it performs load balancing.

bind-server.description: Configure the IP address of a DHCPv4 server and the weight of a specified DHCPv4 server when it performs load balancing.

ip-address.description: Specify the IP address of the DHCPv4 server in the dotted decimal format.

vpn-instance.description: Specify the VPN instance name. If the dhcp-server belongs to the public netwaork, vpn-instance can be defined as '_public_'.

weight.description: Specify the weight of a DHCPv4 server.

giaddr.description: Configure the giaddr address of packets sent by a DHCPv4 server group.
Configure the giaddr address of packets sent by a DHCPv4 server group.

if-name.description: Specify the interface whose IP address that is used as the GiAddr address.
Specify the interface whose IP address that is used as the GiAddr address of packets sent by the DHCPv4 server group.

ip-address.description: Specify the IP address that is used as the GiAddr address.
Specify the IP address that is used as the GiAddr address of packets sent by the DHCPv4 server group. The address is in dotted decimal notation.

forward-rui-slave.description: Enable/disable the slave device forwarding of RUI.

server-algorithm.description: Configure an algorithm of DHCPv4 servers.

loose-check.description: Enable/disable DHCPv4 server algorithm as check-loose when algorithmType is polling.

server-forward.description: Configure the device to forward DHCP rebind messages to all DHCPv4 servers in a DHCPv4 server group.

rebind-forward.description: Enable/disable the device to forward DHCP rebind messages to all DHCPv4 servers in a DHCPv4 server group.

server-source.description: Configure the source IP address of the packets sent by a DHCPv4 server group.

config.description: Configure the source IP address of the packets sent by a DHCPv4 server group.

gateway-mode.description: Indicate the gateway address of the user address pool as source address.
Indicate that the source address of the packets sent by the DHCPv4 server group is the gateway address of the user address pool.

if-name.description: Indicate the IP address of the interface as the source address.
Indicate that the source address of the packets sent by the DHCPv4 server group is the IP address of the interface.

dhcp-servers_schema.description: List of DHCP servers. A DHCP server must be bound to at least one dhcp-server group at the same time.

dhcp-server.description: Configure a DHCP server and must bind it to at least one dhcp-server group at the same time.

ip-address.description: The IP address of the DHCP server.

vpn-instance.description: Define the vpn-instance of a DHCP server. If dhcp-server belongs to the public network, vpn-instance can be defined as '_public_'.

timeout-packets.description: Number of times that a DHCP server fails to respond to a DHCP request before the timer expires.
